description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.en: Introduction to Mobile and Wireless Systems

description.zh: (1)行動通訊概念，(2)行動無線電傳遞，(3)通訊蜂巢概念，(4)無線電通道配置法，(5)行動網路系統，(6)行動路由法， (7)網路通訊協約，(8)簡述WMAN, WLAN, and WPAN，(9)行動隨意與無線感測網路，(10)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Mobile Communication Concept,(2)Mobile Radio Propagation,(3)Cellular Concept,(4)Radio Channel Allocation,(5)Mobile Network Systems,(6)Mobile Routing,(7)Network Protocols,(8)Wireless MANs, LANs, and PANs,(9)Mobile Ad Hoc and Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 1.隨機程序之複習2.假設之檢定3.在可加性高斯白雜訊玾 境中固定訊號之偵測4.在非白色雜訊環境中固定訊號之偵測5.非同調偵測6.訊號參數之估計7.連續波形之估計
description.en: 1.Review of Basic Stochastic Processes2.Hypothesis Testing3.Detection of Deterministic Signal in Additive White   Gaussion Nosie4.Detection of Deterministic Signal in Nonwhite Gaussion  Noise5.Non-coherent Detection6.Estimationof Signal Parameters7.Estimation of Continuous Waveforms

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 因應高齡化社會的來臨，本課程探討高齡者的健康、住家、行動力、通訊、休閒和工作等議題，以使用者為中心發掘問題，提出改善高齡者生活之產品、環境或服務設計，以達到在地安養的目的。
description.en: To cope with the coming of the aging society, issues about health, housing, mobility, communication, leisure and work for senior citizens are discussed in the class.  User-centred approaches are adopted to explore the difficulties the senior citizens encountered in their daily life.  Product, environment of services designs are proposed to improve the living quality for the senior citizens.  Hopefully, the concept of aging in place will be realized.

name.zh: 流行時尚與產品人類學

description.zh: 以人類學觀點，從資本主義與文化消費社會形塑過程中，考察日常生活用品之流行時尚現象，包括文化消費、身體消費、影像消費、網路消費、時髦物體系、產品與主體建構、次文化認同、後現代認同等課題之理論介紹、案例分析與產品俗民誌實習。
description.en: From the viewpoint of anthropology, this course is to inquire the fashion phenomena of everyday commodities in the context of capitalism and the formation of cultural consumption.  The contents include the introduction of theories, the case studies, and the practices of product ethnography in the aspects of cultural consumption, body consumption, image consumption, internet consumption, systems of fashion objects, 3C products and subjectivity construction, subculture identity, and post-modern identity.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(五)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(V)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

name.en: Special Topics in Design Thinking Practice I

description.zh: 引導學生透過課堂上的遊戲、討論、體驗、演練等創意活動，從實作中學習設計思考的原理、過程與應用，進而反思自己所建構的設計思考方法。
description.en: This course is to lead students a learning-by-doing fashion to help them understand the theories, processes, and application of design thinking by means of playing games, discussion, experience, and doing exercises at classroom, and accordingly, reflect their own approach to design thinking.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標(UN SDGs)的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層(BOP)與創造共享價值(Creating Shared Value, CSV)之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

name.zh: 防減災與氣候變遷調適
name.en: Disaster Prevention and Reduction, Climate Change Adaptation

description.zh: 全球暖化與氣候變遷已對人類社會造成面臨前所未有的挑戰。不論是哪個國家，都遭受其帶來的影響。並且在IPCC發布的報告中，諸多科學證據證實氣候變遷已是不可改變的事實，因此為了謀求世界各地環境的永續發展，「減緩」與「調適」是現階段全球順應氣候變遷積極採取的方式。在聯合國報告中曾經指出我國臺灣舉凡環境及氣候條件隸屬於氣候變遷高危險群，極端氣候事件，例如熱浪、颱風、洪水…等皆逐漸嚴重影響我們的家園，因此，防減災與氣候變遷調適相對更加重要。其中氣候變遷調適更是能夠面對未來氣候可能產生的衝擊，透過周延的規畫以適應充滿挑戰與變化的新環境。因此本課程針對國際與我國減少災害風險與氣候變遷調適介紹，並探討其各中因應方式與困境等課題，期藉培養與提高對氣候變遷防減災與氣候變遷調適的認識。
description.en: Global warming and climate change are the biggest challenges to human society. With current warming trend proceeds at an unprecedented rate, climate change poses a threat to all countries. In the IPCC assessment reports, much of scientific evidence indicates climate change an unalterable fact, so in order to meet the needs of present generations without jeopardizing the ability of futures generations to meet their own need, approaches on "mitigation" and "adaptation" needed to be adopted in response to climate change. Taiwan is vulnerable and at high risk to climate change because of geographic exposure and climatic conditions. Extreme weather events, such as heat wave, typhoon, and flood, bring catastrophic damages in Taiwan. Hence, proper climate change adaptation and disaster risk reduction measures needed to be taken proactively to reduce many of the adverse impacts and to enhance beneficial impacts. Through this course, students will increase their awareness and understanding to

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en: 1.Frequency response 2.Feedback amplifier3.Stability analysis4.Operational amplifier5.Waveform generators and shaping 6.Filter7.Power amplifier

description.zh: 內容包函：(1)串級放大電路; (2)場效電晶體之特性; (3)場效電晶體放大電路; (4)運算放大器應用電路(反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5)基本振盪電路(RC振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6)高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應; (7)回授放大器; (8)放大器之穩定性實驗; (9)振盪器設計; (10)主動濾波器; (11)功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

notes: 綜501  與職二子三合開

description.zh: 介紹醫學美容之基本概念，並了解各式醫學美容治療項目，使學生了解藥物的基本概念，且了解不同藥物之功能與能量代謝之原理。
description.en: Introduction of basic principals of cosmetic medicine, including iontophoresis, sonophoresis, LASER therapy, skin peeler, etc. In addition, the students will understand the basic principles of cosmetic medicine.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 1.輪胎模型 2.輪胎性能參數 3.穩態操控 4.暫態操控 5.四輪操控 6.乘坐舒適性分析
description.en: To provide an overview of ground vehicle handling and ride performance through the development, analysis and interpretation of vehicle models.  The course is divided into three major parts: Tire modeling, Handling, and Ride.  For each part, case study examples will be used to illustrate the important design considerations.

description.zh: 進階冰水主機實習、進階冷凍工程實習、進階中央空調系統實習、空調設備工程品質管理實務、進階空調工程實習。
description.en: Advanced practices and experiments of water chiller unit, refrigeration engineering, central air conditioning system, quality control of air conditioning facilities, and air conditioning engineering.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(一)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (I)

description.zh: 針對特定設計議題，學生學習應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: Focusing on specific design issues, the subject directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.zh: 產品分析與產品服務系統
name.en: Product Analysis and Product Service System

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討並演練各種分析工具與手段，藉以解析市場產品的功能、使用性、材料與製造、文化與美感，並解析顧客的需求與渴望。在此基礎下，導入產品服務系統(Product Service System)的理論，以更寬廣的視野探討消費者的需求，並以workshop驗證之。
description.en: Product Analysis is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Through product analysis, designers interpret characteristics of every single product of a specific market and gain a summary of the competition among brands. Lecture on methods of product analysis will be given followed by case studies and practice. Furthermore, the concept and theory of Product Service System (PSS) will be engaged to enhance a broader vision to customers' requirement. A marketable set of products and services is capable of jointly fulfilling a user's needs and having a lower environmental impact than traditional business models. Workshop will be carried out to fulfill this aspiration.

description.zh: 本課程為增進學生對實務的了解，以因應快速變遷之營運環境，增進學生對理論與實務結合之瞭解。企業能夠因應經濟環境趨勢，發掘機會，建構核心能力，掌握競爭優勢，永續企業經營，透過成功的企業個案研究提供學生學習了解。
description.en: This course is to enhance students understanding of the management practice. In the rapidly changing environment, the student should understand the theory and practice of management. Businesses build core competency to get the competitive advantage. This course uses the case study students to learn.

description.zh: 貨幣功能及演進臺灣地區及美國金融市場資金融通與金融市場組織業銀行的資金來源商業銀行的資金去向存款貨幣的創造訊息成本與財務結構銀行業之管制 貨幣需要理論
description.en: The Evolution and Function of Money, The Financial System of Taiwan, The Funds of Finance and Financial Market, The Sources of Funds in Commercial Bank, The Uses of Funds in Commercial Bank, The Creation of Deposits, Information Cost and Financial Structure, The Regulation of Banking Industry, Theory of Money Demand

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業/工業4.0調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業/工業4.0產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

name.zh: 大數據分析與資料探勘
name.en: Big Data Analysis and Data Mining

description.zh: 在網路時代所產生龐大、複雜以及異質的資料環境下，大數據分析 (Big Data Analysis) 已經成為產業界人士必備的關鍵能力。然而，目前的大數據分析談的人多，做的人少，因此，本課程將從HADOOP生態體系 (Hadoop Ecosystem) 以及NOSQL資料庫 (NOSQL Database) 開始介紹，讓同學了解目前大數據分析中的熱門套件及概念，接著介紹大數據分析的核心工具-資料探勘方法 (Data Mining techniques) 的操作，期望建立同學大數據分析的必備概念外，更能建構大數據分析的基本操作能力。
description.en: Big data analysis is become an essential and key skill in the internet era because data is more and more large, complex, and heterogeneous. The component of Hadoop ecosystem and NOSQL database will be included in this course. Besides, the core concept of big data analysis, data mining techniques, will also be introduced. Students will learn how to implement big data analysis with related software.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 研究光的特質，了解攝影的原理，利用攝影的器材、設備、透過攝影的技法，表現攝影的藝術價值，達到攝影創作的目的。
description.en: This course makes students familiar with the nature of light, the principles and the techniques of photography. Through the practice of equipments and tools of photography, the students can learn how to create and express the artistic value of photography.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美 的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表 達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與實務界交流的平台，邀請不同領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current industry, through giving speeches from different field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the industry's current status and future direction of learning.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

notes: 綜501  與職四子二合開

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用孼費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.zh: 本課程內容為介紹鋼構造建築物之基本特性，超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，使學生習得解決建築空間與結構型態之實務問題，其主要授課內容為：（1）鋼骨構架之特性，（2）於各種載重下鋼骨構材之行為，（3）鋼構架之變形能力與破壞機構，（4）超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，（5）消能裝置之特性及運用，（6）隔震、制震之現況及展望。
description.en: This course introduced the basic characteristics about steel structure, the structural systems and forms of hi-rise building and special indoor space, in order to provide students to learn the relation between architectural space and structural type, the course consists of (1)the characteristics of steel element,(2)behavior of steel element under variable loads,(3)deformation capacity and collapse mechanism of steel frame,(4)structural system of special indoor space,(5)the application and properties of energy dissipaters or mechanical dampers,(6)the view of base isolators and response control system of structures.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

notes: 與日間部合開，限10人，中英授課

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

notes: 日職合開(新聘兼任教師)

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

notes: 綜科327 技術組/管理組

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。鑄造用材料、鑄鐵、鑄鋼及非鐵金屬之鑄造、鑄造品之熱處理、特殊鑄造程序及方法。
description.en: Pattern, Molding Processes and Materials, Molding Processes, Cores, Solidification of Metals, Principles of Metallurgy,  Gating Systems Pouring, Materials for Foundry Engineering,  Casting Steel and Non-metals, Heat treatment of Casting Works, Special Casting Processes and Methods etc.

notes: 與訓四機三甲乙 合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3001018或負責教授同意。介紹特殊加工如超音波加工、放電加工、雷射加工、化學蝕刻、電化學加工、電子束加工、高壓水束加工等，及表面處裡技術等，除了說明加工原理外並探討各加工法之技術。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to special material processing methods including ultrasonic machining,  electrical-discharge machining, laser-material processing, chemical machining, electrochemical machining, electron-beam machining, hydrodynamic machining, and surface treatment techniques, In addition to the principles, techniques for the corresponding process will be discussed.

notes: 與訓四機三甲乙 合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

name.zh: 大數據分析與創新應用專題
name.en: Big Data Analytics and Innovative Application Study

description.zh: 本課程將使學員熟習各項創新應用的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋創新應用之起源與發展近況，使學員具備創新研究方法與分析創新應用專題之能力，並探討創新品質技術之理論與應用。課程第二階段將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間的關聯，以及並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用面有更深層的認識。
description.en: This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of innovative application and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application in innovation. The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in the second phase. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retail, among others.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1)領導的基本概念；(2)中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3)領導的案例研究；(4)領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。

Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: An Analysis of the Market in China and the ASEAN

description.zh: 市場分析是現代經營管理人才不可缺少的分析技術，亦是現代企業制定行銷策略與經營管理之重要依據。面對崛起的中國及東協市場經濟動能，全球爭先恐後分食商機，台灣企業更需掌握優勢積極佈局。本課程旨在於教導學生如何運用科學方法分析中國大陸及東協市場之特點及運行規律。由個體角度探討中國及東協國家生產者與消費者從事市場活動之行為模式，從總體方面探討企業在中國及東協國家特殊政治、經濟、社會、文化情勢下所面臨的潛在機會與挑戰。本課程除介紹市場分析之基本方法，亦將搭配個案分析，藉由跨國企業在中國及東協市場成功之發展策略反觀市場之重要特色。
description.en: The course of Market Analysis is a necessary skill for people who are engaged in modern business management. It is also the important basis by which an enterprise makes its marketing strategy and operates the business. China and the ASEAN market economic are increasing. Taiwan companies need to grasp and adjustment the advantages. The objective of this course is to guide students to analyses the characteristics and rules in China and the ASEAN market by scientific methods. In microscopic way, we research the economic behavior of producers and consumers in China and the ASEAN market. In macroscopic way, we discuss the potential chances and challenges the enterprises need to face. This course not only introduces fundamental way to analyses China and the ASEAN market, but also adopts case study to prove the results concluded from the analysis.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過"環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築"等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

description.zh: 應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、工業管理應用程式實例簡介。
description.en: This course is consists of: computer hardware structure, computer operation systems, computer software systems, basic programming language and applications, data process, file management, database management systems, applied package, and the applications of these Knowledge in IE.

description.zh: 氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源，致動器，控制元件及迴路,傳送,配管, 維護與安全。
description.en: Introduction of Pneumatic, Pneumatic elements Instruction, Electrical Parts for Pneumatic Control, Pneumatic Basic control circuit, Pneumatic Application control Circuit, Introduction of Hydraulic, Hydraulic control Element Instruction, Electrical Parts for Hydraulic Control, Hydraulic Basic Control Circuit, Hydraulic Application Control Circuit, and Pneumatic and Hydraulic Trouble Shooting.
